gave him a kiss and a pat.
And then he went on the back end,
lifted up his tail,
and shoved the bar of soap up his back leg.
And he parried it to reach it.
And I went back to the boys.
I told them I know it.
And about three hours after he'd come running down,
shouting his head off,
down, down!
And he couldn't sit down,
he was tall, tall from the end.
And I went back with him and the donkey was standing up.
And he dropped him off there,
they fell to a wheelbarrow.
So I don't think it was a good day.
So it wasn't all bad.
No, no, there's a story.
